original_text: When it was nearly time to close the gate of the city for the night, they left. I do not know where they went. If you chase after them quickly, you may catch them.’
korean_text: 그 사람들이 어두워 성문을 닫을 때쯤 되어 나갔으니 어디로 갔는지 내가 알지 못하나 급히 따라가라 그리하면 그들을 따라잡으리라 하였으나

sentences.original_text: When it was nearly time to close the gate
sentences.korean_translation: 문을 닫을 시간이 거의 되었을 때

sentences.original_text: of the city for the night
I do not know where they went
If you chase after them quickly

sentences.korean_translation: 당신은 그들을 잡을 수 있을 것입니다
